thread.title: MacGyver is still trying to save the world
thread.title_full: MacGyver is still trying to save the world

title: MacGyver is still trying to save the world
text:
Richard Dean Anderson on MacGyver and Sea Shepherd Wenlei Ma news.com.au Richard Dean Anderson on MacGyver and Sea Shepherd Wenlei Ma news.com.au In his heyday. 
FOR seven years, he graced TV screens all over the world as MacGyver â€” the hero who could save the good guys from any situation with his trusty Swiss Army knife and a wad of chewed-up gum. 
Or stop an acid leak with pieces of chocolate. And escape from East Germany hidden in a coffin that turned into a jet ski. (It was the Cold War era, remember.) 
The iconic eighties and early-nineties show made Richard Dean Anderson a mainstream global star and he would go on to win over a legion of sci-fi fans for his eight-year run on Stargate SG-1 . Other Stories
